2106990.name: Vain Ascendance Demo
2106990.description:
Valerie Malbec is a regular fashion obsessed vampire who wants to go on vacation. All that's stopping her is her sensitivity to sunlight, and rumour has it that a local corporation has a cure.

Ascend 1 unique area in the search for a cure to Valerie's sunlight sensitivity! The rooms you encounter are randomized each time, so don't get too comfortable! Use Valerie's fantastic mobility to advance through the platforming levels, and dash into enemies to steal blood. Remember to save some for upgrade cocktails for when you're back at home!

Features

  • Momentum based movement
  • Gorgeous custom pixel art and animation
  • A banger custom electronic soundtrack
  • Two cute anime girls
  • Teri the Tutorial Bat
2106990.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
